brand.name: Kachel
brand.ethicalInfo1: Kachel does not provide sufficient information about its environmental policies
brand.ethicalInfo2:
Kachel is owned by Voyager Distributing Co.

Its environment rating is very poor'. It does not publish sufficient relevant information about its environmental policies to give a higher rating. As a shopper you have the right to know how its production practices impact on the environment.

Its labour rating is very poor' based on the 2017 Ethical Fashion Report. This looks at criteria including payment of a living wage, transparency and worker empowerment. It received the bottom score for its Supplier Code of Conduct included in its supplier contracts. It does not trace any of its supply chain, it does not publicly list any of its suppliers and it does not ensure that subcontracting does not occur. It does not audit any of its traced facilities has made little to no progress towards paying a living wage across its supply chain.

Its animal rating is not good enough'. It uses angora, leather and wool without stating its sources. It does not use fur or down.

Kachel is rated Not Good Enough' based on information from the 2017 Ethical Fashion Report and our own research.
brand.positiveText: Dear Kachel, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Kachel, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
